overview: Li Tai must endure terrible hardship under his sadistic Kung-fu master in order to perfect his fighting technique. The ambitious young man finally has a chance to prove himself when his old master meets his match and Li has to use the eighteen secrets of kung fu to fight the challenger.
tagline: You've seen the Snake Fist... and the Needles of Death. In the Hands of the Dragon 18 are Death!
title: 18 Weapons of Kung Fu
